Title: Universal Tilt Behavior
Description: Tilt effect behavior for Universal Apps
HomeWiki:
Project Description

UniversalTilt is a Universal App behavior that add the "tilt" effect in any framework element.

The nuget package is : https://www.nuget.org/packages/UniversalTilt

Usage

Install Nuget package, then add the behavior this way :

 <TextBlock Text="Hello World"
                   FontSize="50"
                   HorizontalAlignment="Center"
                   VerticalAlignment="Center"
                   Name="AName">
      <interactivity:Interaction.Behaviors>
            <arcanaStudio:UniversalTilt />
      </interactivity:Interaction.Behaviors>
 </TextBlock>
